item.title: How I Work
item.description: How I Work Current Linux Distribution: Ubuntu Server 18.04 Current Workstation: 15” 2016 Macbook Pro w/ 27” Monitor Technical Specs: Ram: 16gb Hard Disk: 512gb CPU: Intel i7 2.6GHz Intel Core Applications: Text Editor: Visual Studio Code and Vim for servers Web Browser: Google Chrome Music Player: Spotify Word Processor: Google Docs Note Taking: Paper and Whiteboards Research Notebook: Giving the rocketbook everlast a try for a bit, Paper for everything else To do list: Index Cards, trying to migrate to bullet journal Calendar: Google Calendar

item.title: Tmux Usage
item.description: Installation To install tmux, use the provided package manager. Ubuntu is shown below: $ sudo apt-get install tmux Commands Shortcut (Used to invoke all commands for tmux) ctrl-b command Show Sessions ctrl-b S or $ tmux ls Create a New Session $ tmux new -s session_name Attach to an Existing Session $ tmux a -t session Kill a Session $ tmux kill-session -t session-name Commands Command Code Description ?
